resources.string: The CN Tower is Toronto\'s tallest and most defining landmark featuring a glass floor & a revolving eatery with panoramic views.
301 Front St W, Toronto, ON M5V 2T6
Canada\'s largest museum of world cultures and natural history, the ROM has more than six million objects in its collections and galleries showcasing art, archaeology and science.
Immerse yourself in a world of 16000 aquatic animals and discover your own underwater adventure at Ripley\'s Aquarium.

This large, centrally located park is a jewel in Toronto\’s park system. High Park combines extensive natural areas with maintained parkland, recreational facilities and popular attractions for a unique urban park experience that can be enjoyed year-round.
1873 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M6R 2Z3
Centre Island in Toronto is a surprising getaway just a 20 minute ferry ride away.
Bluffs stretch for about 14 km along the Lake Ontario shore, from the Eastern Beaches of Toronto in the west, to West Hill in the east.
61 Under Cliff Dr, Scarborough, ON M1N 3Z5

The Drake Hotel is a boutique hotel located in the heart of the arts scene and a winner of Fodor\'s 100 Hotel Award 2011. From live music to great food, art and people, the Drake is Toronto\'s hotbed for culture.
1150 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1J3
Experience the elegant sophistication of Four Seasons Hotel Toronto in the heart of Yorkville, steps from upscale shopping and dining quarters
Our luxury 5-star Shangri-La Hotel, Toronto provides comfortably appointed rooms, suites and restaurants as well as excellent amenities.

One of North America’s largest annual fairs, the CNE offers up 18 days of amusement park rides, live entertainment, food, shopping, and more. And, if you’re an airplane enthusiast, the Canadian International Air Show drops jaws every summer when their pilots perform dare-devil loop-de-loops and synchronized maneuvers on the last weekend of the summer.
The Toronto International Film Festival is a publicly attended film festival held each September in Toronto.
Tiff Bell Lightbox, 350 King St W, Toronto, ON M5V 3C6
Fan Expo Canada is an annual multi-genre fan convention.
255 Front St W, Toronto, ON M5V 2W6
